channel.title: Update on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Update on Home

item.title: Update 6.10
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought during 6.10. All the stats (WR, damage, battles, etc.) refer to stats during the update, not cumululative/total/lifetime stats unless otherwise mentioned. In total, there were 196650865 battles recorded by 402435 players.
